column1: Kata Robata////The maitre d was terrible. We stood for 45 minutes
column3: open and were not seated. It smelled funky. When we were seated
column5: we ordered scallops and never received them. Yes
column6: we reminded her three times. Two hours later and no scallops. I ordered a Pinot Grigio
column8: and they brought me a Chardonnay. Maybe
column9: that is not a big deal but I feel like we worked extra hard to pay for a "big ticket" dinner. Â Not returning. Glorified bar.
